class biosim.simulation.BioSim(island_map, ini_pop, seed, ymax_animals=None, cmax_animals=None, img_base=None, img_fmt='png')¶

Simulation of biosim

Attributes
animal_distribution

Pandas DataFrame with animal count per species for each cell on island.

num_animals

Total number of animals on island.

num_animals_per_species

Number of animals per species in island, as dictionary.

year

Last year simulated.

_create_carn_line(self)¶

Creates population graph for Carnivores

_create_herb_line(self)¶

Creates population graph for Herbivores

_create_map(self)¶

Creates map plot out of RGB colors and map string.

_save_graphics(self)¶

Saves the plots as a specified file type.

_setup_graphics(self)¶

Sets up plots and axes for the Simulation to be visualized

Updates the heaptmap for Carnivores

_update_graphics(self)¶

Updates the plots with new data

Updates the heatmap for Herbivores

_update_specie_lines(self)¶

Updates the population lines for Herbivore and Carnivore

add_population(self, population)¶

Add a population to the island

Parameters

population – List of dictionaries specifying population

property animal_distribution¶

Pandas DataFrame with animal count per species for each cell on island.

make_movie(self, movie_fmt='mp4')¶

Create MPEG4 movie from visualization images saved.

property num_animals¶

Total number of animals on island.

property num_animals_per_species¶

Number of animals per species in island, as dictionary.

rgb_value = {'D': (1.0, 1.0, 0.5), 'J': (0.0, 0.6, 0.0), 'M': (0.5, 0.5, 0.5), 'O': (0.0, 0.0, 1.0), 'S': (0.5, 1.0, 0.5)}¶
set_animal_parameters(self, species, params)¶

Set parameters for animal species.

Parameters

  • species – String, name of animal species

  • params – Dict with valid parameter specification for species

set_landscape_parameters(self, landscape, params)¶

Set parameters for landscape type.

Parameters

  • landscape – String, code letter for landscape

  • params – Dict with valid parameter specification for landscape

simulate(self, num_years, vis_years=1, img_years=None)¶

Run simulation while visualizing the result.

Parameters

  • num_years – number of years to simulate

  • vis_years – years between visualization updates

  • img_years – years between visualizations saved to files (default: vis_years)

Image files will be numbered consecutively.

property year¶

Last year simulated.
